pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Tool for Sensitivity Analysis in Structural Equation Modeling // Perform sensitivity analysis in structural equation modeling using meta-heuristic optimization methods (e.g., ant colony optimization and others). The references for the proposed methods are: (1) Harring, J. R., McNeish, D. M., Hancock, G. R. (2017) doi:10.1080/10705511.2018.1506925; (2) Socha, K., Dorigo, M. (2008) doi:10.1016/j.ejor.2006.06.046. We also thank Dr. Krzysztof Socha for sharing his thesis and R code, which provided the base for the development of this package.
